#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
//#include<fstream> //COMMENT THIS LATER

using namespace std;
int main()
{
    //ifstream in("in.txt"); //COMMENT THIS
    //cin.rdbuf(in.rdbuf()); //COMMENT THIS
    int T,K,N,count=0,max;
    string s;
    char ch;
    vector<int> f;
    string::iterator it;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
    max=0;
    f.clear();

        cin>>N>>K;
        cin>>s;
        it = s.begin();
        while(it!=s.end())
        {
            ch = *it;
            count=0;
            while(*it==ch)
            {
                count+=1;
                it++;
            }
            if(count>max) max=count;
            f.push_back(count);
        }
        count = 0;
        if(K<=max)
        {
            for(int i=0;i<f.size();i++)
            {
                count+=ceil((double)f[i]/(double)K);
            }
            cout<<count<<"\n";
        }
        else
        cout<<-1<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
